description: A wire or combination of wires not insulated from one another, with consistent electrical characteristics, used to carry direct current between points in the DC region of the power system.

contents.name: PerLengthParameter
contents.description: Set of per-length parameters for this line segment.

contents.name: inductance

contents.description: Segment length for calculating line section capabilities.

contents.description: Resistance of the DC line segment.
